Description.Name: LB 2-X Slug Ammo
Description.Details: Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type. Ammo Bins will explode and destroy their installed location when they receive a Critical Hit. LB 2-X AC Slug Ammo Bins each contain 12 rounds and may feed multiple weapons. Slugs are single large projectiles, similar to standard AC/2 rounds and deal the amount of damage indicated by the autocannon itself - +/- 5 points of damage variance - as well as 5 points of bonus stability damage. Ammunition type can be changed by clicking the right side of the weapons activation panel during combat if more than one type of ammunition is present.
